content.question: Which of the following relationships is best represented by the graph shown?

choices.label: The position is directly related to time.
The position is directly related to time squared.

The position is directly related to <math alttext="the fraction1 over time" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mtext>time</mtext></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>.

The position is directly related to <math alttext="the fraction 1 over time squared " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mtext>time squared</mtext></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>.
The position is directly related to the square root of time.

content.answer: The position is directly related to time squared.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
